paragraphs.text: Iceberg spikes are artificial segments of frozen water created by waterbenders as a primary defense against intruders. They are mostly seen scattered around the vicinity of the Northern Water Tribe, in the ocean surrounding the Water Tribe stronghold. Resembling large and jagged icebergs, they are strong enough to rip through metal. Coupled with the vicious currents in iceberg fields, they are able to sink even the largest of ships.

paragraphs.body: In addition to their defensive purpose, iceberg spikes also serve as ambush points. Water Tribe ${link_0} can dock behind the spikes and raid approaching vessels.
